description: A small village just a few kilometres from Udine provides the backdrop for modern, regionally influenced cuisine with plenty of character. The renovated dining rooms have two distinct styles: the one near the entrance is friendly and relaxed; the other has a much more formal ambience. The large outdoor space is perfect for summer dining.
creditCards: ['Credit card / Debit card accepted', ' Mastercard credit card', ' Visa credit card']
